hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/lib/jenkins/ tar cvf /var/lib/jenkins/jenkins-config.tar config.xml hudson.model.UpdateCenter.xml hudson.plugins.git.GitTool.xml jenkins.security.QueueItemAuthenticatorConfiguration.xml nodeMonitors.xml jobs/*/config.xml users/*/config.xml plugins/*.*pi git add jenkins-config.tar
got_nothing_to_commit=`git status | grep "nothing added to commit" | wc -l`
if [ "$got_nothing_to_commit" = "1" ] ; then echo no changes to commit exit 0 fi
git commit -m "commit performed for following reason: $message" .
git push -u origin master
